Typically, a compositor written with Qt Wayland Compositor becomes a subsystem inside a larger application manager process. Qt Wayland Compositor provides the APIs to communicate with clients and display their content on the screen. The QML APIs contain high-level APIs that easily integrate with the rest of Qt, enabling convenient animations, effects, and UI through Qt Quick. There are also C++ APIs available - if you need more low-level access.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下,使用Qt Wayland Compositor编写的合成器会成为一个更大的应用程序管理器进程中的一个子系统。Qt Wayland Compositor提供了与客户端通信并在屏幕上显示其内容的API。QML API包含了高级的API,可以很容易地与Qt的其他部分集成,通过Qt Quick实现方便的动画、效果和UI。如果你需要更多的低级访问,还可以使用C++API。

trans-unit.source: Typically, a resource-definition script (.rc file) is compiled to a Windows resource file. Within the Microsoft toolchain, the RC tool generates a .res file, which can be linked with the Microsoft linker to an EXE or DLL. The MinGW toolchain uses the windres tool to generate an .o file that can be linked with the MinGW linker to an EXE or DLL.
trans-unit.target: 通常，资源定义脚本（.rc文件）被编译为Windows资源文件。在Microsoft工具链中，RC工具生成一个.res文件，该文件可以与Microsoft链接程序链接到EXE或DLL。该MinGW的工具链使用windres工具生成可以与被链接的.o文件将MinGW的链接到一个EXE或DLL。

trans-unit.source: UCS-4 is a Unicode codec and therefore it is lossless. All characters from this string will be encoded in UCS-4. Any invalid sequence of code units in this string is replaced by the Unicode replacement character (QChar::ReplacementCharacter, which corresponds to U+FFFD).
trans-unit.target: UCS-4是Unicode编解码器，因此是无损的。该字符串中的所有字符都将以UCS-4编码。此字符串中任何无效的代码单元序列均由Unicode替换字符（QChar :: ReplacementCharacter，它对应于 U+FFFD ）替换。

trans-unit.source: UCS-4 is a Unicode codec and therefore it is lossless. All characters from this string will be encoded in UCS-4. Any invalid sequence of code units in this string is replaced by the Unicode's replacement character (QChar::ReplacementCharacter, which corresponds to U+FFFD).

trans-unit.source: UDP (User Datagram Protocol) is a lightweight, unreliable, datagram-oriented, connectionless protocol. It can be used when reliability isn't important. QUdpSocket is a subclass of QAbstractSocket that allows you to send and receive UDP datagrams.
trans-unit.target: UDP（用户数据报协议）是一种轻量级，不可靠，面向数据报的无连接协议。当可靠性不重要时可以使用它。QUdpSocket是QAbstractSocket的子类，可让您发送和接收UDP数据报。

trans-unit.source: UDP (User Datagram Protocol) is a lightweight, unreliable, datagram-oriented, connectionless protocol. It can be used when reliability isn't important. For example, a server that reports the time of day could choose UDP. If a datagram with the time of day is lost, the client can simply make another request.
trans-unit.target: UDP(用户数据报协议)是一种轻量级的、不可靠的、面向数据报的、无连接的协议。当可靠性不重要时,可以使用它。例如,一个报告一天时间的服务器可以选择UDP。如果丢失了一个包含时间的数据报,客户端只需再提出一个请求即可。

trans-unit.source: UDP (User Datagram Protocol) is a lightweight, unreliable, datagram-oriented, connectionless protocol. It can be used when reliability isn't important. QUdpSocket is a subclass of QAbstractSocket that allows you to send and receive UDP datagrams.

trans-unit.source: URLs can be represented in two forms: encoded or unencoded. The unencoded representation is suitable for showing to users, but the encoded representation is typically what you would send to a web server. For example, the unencoded URL "http://bühler.example.com/List of applicants.xml" would be sent to the server as "http://xn--bhler-kva.example.com/List%20of%20applicants.xml".
trans-unit.target: URL可以两种形式表示：已编码或未编码。未编码的表示形式适合显示给用户，但是编码的表示形式通常是您要发送到Web服务器的形式。例如，未编码的URL“ http：//bühler.example.com/lists.xml”将作为“ http://xn--bhler-kva.example.com/List%20of%”发送到服务器。 20applicants.xml”。

trans-unit.source: UTF-8 is a Unicode codec and can represent all characters in a Unicode string like QString. However, invalid sequences are possible with UTF-8 and, if any such are found, they will be replaced with one or more "replacement characters", or suppressed. These include non-Unicode sequences, non-characters, overlong sequences or surrogate codepoints encoded into UTF-8.
trans-unit.target: UTF-8是Unicode编解码器，可以表示Unicode字符串（如QString）中的所有字符。但是，UTF-8可能会出现无效序列，如果找到任何无效序列，它们将被一个或多个“替换字符”替换，或被抑制。这些包括非Unicode序列，非字符，超长序列或编码为UTF-8的替代代码点。

trans-unit.source: UV0 -> vec2, the first set of texture coordinates in the vertex shader. When the mesh for the associated model does not provide texture coordinates, the value is vec2(0.0).
UV1 -> vec2, the second set of texture coordinates in the vertex shader. When the mesh for the associated model does not provide a second set of texture coordinates, the value is vec2(0.0).
UWP (Universal Windows Platform)
UWP applications are UI applications by nature. This implies that console type applications will have a window created internally, which is always visible.

UWP applications must be packaged (including all dependencies) and installed or registered with the application service in order to be launched. The WinRT Runner Tool can be used to launch these applications from the command line.

trans-unit.source: Under normal circumstances, there is only one tool tip visible at a time. In order to save resources, all items that use the ToolTip attached property share the same visual tool tip label instance. Even though the visuals are shared, text, timeout and delay are stored individually for each item that uses the respective attached property. However, multiple items cannot make the shared tool tip visible at the same time. The shared tool tip is only shown for the last item that made it visible. The position of the shared tool tip is determined by the framework.
trans-unit.target: 在正常情况下，一次只能看到一个工具提示。为了节省资源，所有使用附加了ToolTip的属性的项目都共享相同的可视化工具提示标签实例。即使共享了视觉效果， text ， timeout 和 delay 也会为使用各自附加属性的每个项目单独存储。但是，多个项目不能使共享工具提示同时可见。共享工具提示仅针对使其可见的最后一项显示。共享工具提示的位置由框架确定。

trans-unit.source: Under normal circumstances, there is only one tool tip visible at a time. In order to save resources, all items that use the ToolTip attached property share the same visual tool tip label instance. Even though the visuals are shared, text, timeout and delay are stored individually for each item that uses the respective attached property. However, multiple items cannot make the shared tool tip visible at the same time. The shared tool tip is only shown for the last item that made it visible. The position of the shared tool tip is determined by the framework.

Unicode I/O should be used as this maximizes the portability of documents between users around the world. In many cases it is however still necessary to support other encodings as your users will need to process existing documents. The most important additional encoding to support is the one returned by QTextCodec::codecForLocale(), as this is the one the user is most likely to need for communicating with other people and applications (this is the codec used by local8Bit()).
trans-unit.target: 应该使用Unicode I / O，因为这样可以最大程度地提高世界各地用户之间文档的可移植性。但是，在许多情况下，仍然需要支持其他编码，因为您的用户将需要处理现有文档。支持的最重要的附加编码是QTextCodec :: codecForLocale（）返回的编码，因为这是用户最可能需要与其他人和应用程序进行通信的编码（这是local8Bit（）使用的编码解码器）。

trans-unit.source: Unicode has a certain number of code points that are classified as "non-characters:" that is, they can be used for internal purposes in applications but cannot be used for text interchange. Those are the last two entries each Unicode Plane ([0xfffe..0xffff], [0x1fffe..0x1ffff], etc.) as well as the entries in range [0xfdd0..0xfdef].
trans-unit.target: Unicode有一定数量的码点被归类为 "非字符:"也就是说,它们可以用于应用程序的内部用途,但不能用于文本交换。那是每个Unicode平面的最后两个条目([0xfffe...0xffff]、[0x1fffe...0x1ffff]等)以及范围[0xfdd0...0xfd]的条目。

trans-unit.source: Units of Unicode characters that make up what the user thinks of as a character or basic unit of the language are here called Grapheme clusters. The two unicode characters 'A' + diaeresis do for example form one grapheme cluster as the user thinks of them as one character, yet it is in this case represented by two unicode code points (see http://www.unicode.org/reports/tr29/#Grapheme_Cluster_Boundaries).
trans-unit.target: 组成用户所认为的字符或语言基本单位的Unicode字符单位在这里称为Grapheme群集。例如，当用户将两个Unicode字符“ A” + diaeresis看作一个字符时，它们确实形成一个字素簇，但是在这种情况下，它由两个Unicode代码点表示（请参见http://www.unicode.org/ report / tr29 /＃Grapheme_Cluster_Boundaries）。

trans-unit.source: Unix: QSharedMemory "owns" the shared memory segment. When the last thread or process that has an instance of QSharedMemory attached to a particular shared memory segment detaches from the segment by destroying its instance of QSharedMemory, the Unix kernel release the shared memory segment. But if that last thread or process crashes without running the QSharedMemory destructor, the shared memory segment survives the crash.
trans-unit.target: Unix：QSharedMemory “拥有”共享内存段。当最后一个具有QSharedMemory实例附加到特定共享内存段的线程或进程通过销毁其QSharedMemory实例而与该段分离时，Unix内核将释放共享内存段。但是，如果最后一个线程或进程在没有运行QSharedMemory析构函数的情况下崩溃，则共享内存段将在崩溃中幸免。

trans-unit.source: Unix: QSharedMemory "owns" the shared memory segment. When the last thread or process that has an instance of QSharedMemory attached to a particular shared memory segment detaches from the segment by destroying its instance of QSharedMemory, the Unix kernel release the shared memory segment. But if that last thread or process crashes without running the QSharedMemory destructor, the shared memory segment survives the crash.

trans-unit.source: Unlike Java-style iterators, STL-style iterators point directly at items. The begin() function of a container returns an iterator that points to the first item in the container. The end() function of a container returns an iterator to the imaginary item one position past the last item in the container. end() marks an invalid position; it must never be dereferenced. Unlike software or d3d12, the RHI-based renderer is not an additional adaptation, and is always built-in. As of Qt 5.14 it can be enabled by setting the environment variable QSG_RHI to a non-zero value before starting the application, or via QQuickWindow::setSceneGraphBackend() in combination with QSGRendererInterface::GraphicsApi. When none of this is done, OpenGL is used directly like in previous versions.

Unlike software, the RHI-based renderer is not an additional adaptation, and is always built-in. As of Qt 6.0 it is always enabled. On platforms where multiple graphics APIs are available, the scenegraph makes a platform-specific choice. If this is not desired, applications can force a specified graphics API by setting the environment variable QSG_RHI_BACKEND or via QQuickWindow::setGraphicsApi() in combination with QSGRendererInterface::GraphicsApi.

trans-unit.source: Unlike GLSL's attributes, no names are used for vertex input elements. Therefore qt_Vertex and qt_MultiTexCoord0 are not relevant. Instead, the standard Direct3D semantics, POSITION and TEXCOORD (or TEXCOORD0) are used for identifying the correct input layout.
trans-unit.target: 与GLSL的属性不同，顶点输入元素不使用任何名称。因此，qt_Vertex和qt_MultiTexCoord0不相关。而是使用标准Direct3D语义 POSITION 和 TEXCOORD （或 TEXCOORD0 ）来标识正确的输入布局。

trans-unit.source: Unlike GLSL's samplers, texture and sampler objects are separate in HLSL. Shaders are expected to expect 2D, non-array, non-multisample textures. Both the texture and sampler binding points are expected to be sequential and start from 0 (meaning registers t0, t1, ..., and s0, s1, ..., respectively). Unlike with OpenGL, samplers are not mapped to Qt Quick item properties and therefore the name of the sampler is not relevant. Instead, it is the textures that map to properties referencing Image or ShaderEffectSource items.
trans-unit.target: 与GLSL的采样器不同，纹理和采样器对象在HLSL中是分开的。着色器有望获得2D，非阵列，非多样本纹理。纹理和采样器绑定点都应该是顺序的，并且从0开始（分别意味着寄存器 t0, t1, ... 和 s0, s1, ... ）。与OpenGL不同，采样器不会映射到Qt Quick项目属性，因此采样器的名称不相关。而是，纹理映射到引用Image或ShaderEffectSource项的属性。

trans-unit.source: Unlike JSON and QVariantMap, CBOR map keys can be of any type, not just strings. For that reason, QCborMap is effectively a map between QCborValue keys to QCborValue value elements.
trans-unit.target: 与JSON和QVariantMap不同，CBOR映射键可以是任何类型，而不仅仅是字符串。因此，QCborMap实际上是QCborValue键与QCborValue值元素之间的映射。

trans-unit.source: Unlike JSON and QVariantMap, CBOR map keys can be of any type, not just strings. For that reason, QCborMap is effectively a map between QCborValue keys to QCborValue value elements.

Unlike OpenGL, backends for modern APIs will typically prefer offline compilation and shipping pre-compiled bytecode with applications instead of inlined shader source strings. In this case the string properties for vertex and fragment shaders are treated as URLs referring to local files or files shipped via the Qt resource system.
trans-unit.target: 与OpenGL不同的是,现代API的后端通常更倾向于离线编译,并将预编译的字节码与应用程序一起发布,而不是内嵌着色器源码字符串。在这种情况下,顶点和片段着色器的字符串属性被视为指向本地文件或通过Qt资源系统运送的文件的URL。

trans-unit.source: Unlike OpenGL, the Direct3D backend is able to perform runtime shader compilation on dedicated threads. This is managed transparently to the applications, and means that ShaderEffect items that contain HLSL source strings do not block the rendering or other parts of the application until the bytecode is ready.
trans-unit.target: 与OpenGL不同，Direct3D后端能够在专用线程上执行运行时着色器编译。这对于应用程序是透明管理的，这意味着包含HLSL源字符串的ShaderEffect项在字节码准备好之前不会阻止应用程序的呈现或其他部分。

trans-unit.source: Unlike OpenGL, the Direct3D backend is able to perform runtime shader compilation on dedicated threads. This is managed transparently to the applications, and means that ShaderEffect items that contain HLSL source strings do not block the rendering or other parts of the application until the bytecode is ready.

Unlike OpenGL, whenever you open a file, there is a QFileSelector with the extra hlsl selector used. This provides easy creation of ShaderEffect items that are functional across both backends, for example by placing the GLSL source code into shaders/effect.frag, the HLSL source code or - preferably - pre-compiled bytecode into shaders/+hlsl/effect.frag, while simply writing fragmentShader: "qrc:shaders/effect.frag" in QML. For more details, see ShaderEffect.
trans-unit.target: 与OpenGL不同，无论何时打开文件，都会有一个使用了额外的 hlsl 选择器的QFileSelector。这样可以轻松创建在两个后端都可以使用的ShaderEffect项，例如，将GLSL源代码放入 shaders/effect.frag ，HLSL源代码，或者-最好将预编译的字节码放入 shaders/+hlsl/effect.frag ，而只需在QML中编写 fragmentShader: "qrc:shaders/effect.frag" 。有关更多详细信息，请参见ShaderEffect。

trans-unit.source: Unlike QBENCHMARK, the contents of the contained code block is only run once. The elapsed time will be reported as "0" if it's to short to be measured by the selected backend. (Use)
trans-unit.target: 与QBENCHMARK不同的是,所包含的代码块的内容只运行一次。如果时间太短,不能被选定的后端测量,那么经过的时间将被报告为 "0"。(使用)

trans-unit.source: Unlike QDirModel, QFileSystemModel uses a separate thread to populate itself so it will not cause the main thread to hang as the file system is being queried. Calls to rowCount() will return 0 until the model populates a directory.
trans-unit.target: 与QDirModel不同，QFileSystemModel使用一个单独的线程来填充自身，因此不会在查询文件系统时导致主线程挂起。调用rowCount（）将返回0，直到模型填充目录为止。

trans-unit.source: Unlike QDirModel, QFileSystemModel uses a separate thread to populate itself so it will not cause the main thread to hang as the file system is being queried. Calls to rowCount() will return 0 until the model populates a directory.

Unlike QGLWidget, triggering a buffer swap just for the QOpenGLWidget is not possible since there is no real, onscreen native surface for it. Instead, it is up to the widget stack to manage composition and buffer swaps on the gui thread. When a thread is done updating the framebuffer, call update() on the GUI/main thread to schedule composition.
trans-unit.target: 与QGLWidget不同，不可能仅为QOpenGLWidget触发缓冲区交换，因为没有真正的屏幕本机表面。取而代之的是，由小部件堆栈来管理gui线程上的组​​合和缓冲区交换。当线程完成了对帧缓冲区的更新后，请在GUI /主线程上调用update（）以安排合成。

trans-unit.source: Unlike QGLWidget, triggering a buffer swap just for the QOpenGLWidget is not possible since there is no real, onscreen native surface for it. Instead, it is up to the widget stack to manage composition and buffer swaps on the gui thread. When a thread is done updating the framebuffer, call update() on the GUI/main thread to schedule composition.
Unlike Qt's container iterators, QDirIterator is uni-directional (i.e., you cannot iterate directories in reverse order) and does not allow random access.
trans-unit.target: 与Qt的容器迭代器不同，QDirIterator是单向的（即，您不能以相反的顺序迭代目录），并且不允许随机访问。

trans-unit.source: Unlike Qt's container iterators, QDirIterator is uni-directional (i.e., you cannot iterate directories in reverse order) and does not allow random access.

Unlike STL-style iterators, Java-style iterators point

trans-unit.source: Unlike a view, QModelRoleDataSpan is a span, so it allows for modifications to the underlying elements.

trans-unit.source: Unlike createTextureFromId(), this function supports both direct OpenGL usage and the RHI abstracted rendering path.

Unlike custom materials, effects support multiple passes. For many effects this it not necessary, and when there is a need to apply multiple effects, identical results can often be achieved by chaining together multiple effects in the SceneEnvironment. This is demonstrated by the Custom Effect example as well. However, passes have the possibility to request additional color buffers (texture), and specify which of these additional buffers they output to. This allows implementing more complex image processing techniques since subsequent passes can then use one or more of these additional buffers, plus the original scene's content, as their input. If necessary, these additional buffers can have an extended lifetime, meaning their content is preserved between frames, which allows implementing effects that rely on accumulating content from multiple frames, such as, motion blur.
Unlike destroy(), this function only invokes the type's destructor, it doesn't invoke the delete operator.

Unlike for Qt itself, building applications with qmake is still supported in Qt 6.0, as long as a suitable device spec is available, and the appropriate legacy arguments were passed to CMake or configure when configuring Qt. If this is all true, then running qmake and make will also generate an application binary for the target device.
Unlike hue and saturation properties, lightness does not set the used value, but it shifts the existing source pixel lightness value.
trans-unit.target: 与色调和饱和度属性不同的是,明度并不设置使用值,而是将现有的源像素明度值转移。

trans-unit.source: Unlike its macOS counterpart, only numbers can be used.
trans-unit.target: 与macOS版本不同，只能使用数字。

trans-unit.source: Unlike its macOS counterpart, only numbers can be used.
Unlike move assignment, neither of the two objects ever releases its semaphore, if any, as a consequence of swapping.
trans-unit.target: 与移动赋值不同,两个对象都不会因为交换而释放它的旗语(如果有的话)。

trans-unit.source: Unlike multiple inheritance, adaptors can be added at any time to any object (but not removed), which allows for greater flexibility when exporting existing classes. Another advantage of adaptors is to provide similar but not identical functionality in methods of the same name in different interfaces, a case which can be quite common when adding a new version of a standard interface to an object.
trans-unit.target: 与多重继承不同的是,适配器可以在任何时候添加到任何对象中(但不能删除),这使得在导出现有类时有更大的灵活性。适配器的另一个优点是在不同接口中的同名方法中提供相似但不完全相同的功能,这种情况在向对象添加一个新版本的标准接口时可能相当常见。

trans-unit.source: Unlike other QIODevice implementations, such as QTcpSocket, QFile does not emit the aboutToClose(), bytesWritten(), or readyRead() signals. This implementation detail means that QFile is not suitable for reading and writing certain types of files, such as device files on Unix platforms.
trans-unit.target: 与其他QIODevice实现不同，例如QTcpSocket，QFile不会发出aboutToClose（），bytesWritten（）或readyRead（）信号。此实现细节表示QFile不适合读写某些类型的文件，例如Unix平台上的设备文件。

trans-unit.source: Unlike other QIODevice implementations, such as QTcpSocket, QFile does not emit the aboutToClose(), bytesWritten(), or readyRead() signals. This implementation detail means that QFile is not suitable for reading and writing certain types of files, such as device files on Unix platforms.

Unlike other Qt classes, QStringView uses qsizetype as its size_type, to allow accepting data from std::basic_string without truncation. The Qt API functions, for example length(), return int, while the STL-compatible functions, for example size(), return size_type.
trans-unit.target: 与其他Qt类不同，QStringView使用qsizetype作为其 size_type ，以允许其从 std::basic_string 接收数据而不会被截断。Qt API函数（例如length（））返回 int ，而与STL兼容的函数（例如size（））返回 size_type 。

trans-unit.source: Unlike other Qt classes, QStringView uses qsizetype as its size_type, to allow accepting data from std::basic_string without truncation. The Qt API functions, for example length(), return int, while the STL-compatible functions, for example size(), return size_type.

Unlike plain C++ arrays, QLists can be resized at any time by calling resize(). If the new size is larger than the old size, QList might need to reallocate the whole list. QList tries to reduce the number of reallocations by preallocating up to twice as much memory as the actual data needs.

Unlike plain C++ arrays, QVectors can be resized at any time by calling resize(). If the new size is larger than the old size, QVector might need to reallocate the whole vector. QVector tries to reduce the number of reallocations by preallocating up to twice as much memory as the actual data needs.
trans-unit.target: 与普通的C ++数组不同，可以通过调用resize（）随时调整QVectors的大小。如果新大小大于旧大小，则QVector可能需要重新分配整个向量。QVector试图通过预分配多达实际数据需求两倍的内存来减少重新分配的次数。

trans-unit.source: Unlike plain C++ arrays, QVectors can be resized at any time by calling resize(). If the new size is larger than the old size, QVector might need to reallocate the whole vector. QVector tries to reduce the number of reallocations by preallocating up to twice as much memory as the actual data needs.

Unlike queued slots or invoked methods, methods called directly on the QThread object will execute in the thread that calls the method. When subclassing QThread, keep in mind that the constructor executes in the old thread while run() executes in the new thread. If a member variable is accessed from both functions, then the variable is accessed from two different threads. Check that it is safe to do so.
trans-unit.target: 与排队的插槽或调用的方法不同，直接在QThread对象上调用的方法将在调用该方法的线程中执行。子类化QThread时，请记住，构造函数在旧线程中执行，而run（）在新线程中执行。如果从两个函数访问成员变量，则将从两个不同的线程访问该变量。检查这样做是否安全。

trans-unit.source: Unlike queued slots or invoked methods, methods called directly on the QThread object will execute in the thread that calls the method. When subclassing QThread, keep in mind that the constructor executes in the old thread while run() executes in the new thread. If a member variable is accessed from both functions, then the variable is accessed from two different threads. Check that it is safe to do so.
Unlike signals, method parameter types do not have to be declared as they default to the var type.
trans-unit.target: 与信号不同，方法参数类型不必声明，因为它们默认为 var 类型。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the 2D scene graph in Qt Quick, the spatial scene graph exposes resource nodes to the user directly. So for example in Qt Quick, while QSGTexture is public API, there is no QQuickItem that exposes this object directly. Instead the user must either use an Image item, which describes both where the texture comes from as well as how to render it, or write C++ code to operate on the QSGTexture itself. In Qt Quick 3D these resources are exposed directly in the QML API. This is necessary because resources are an important part of the scene state. These resources can be referenced by many objects in the scene: for example, many Materials could use the same Texture. It is also possible to set properties of a Texture at runtime that would directly change how a texture is sampled, for example.

Unlike the QBluetoothDeviceDiscoveryAgent::finished() signal this signal will even be emitted when an error occurred during the service discovery. Therefore it is recommended to check the error() signal to evaluate the success of the service discovery discovery.
trans-unit.target: 与QBluetoothDeviceDiscoveryAgent :: finished（）信号不同，在服务发现期间发生错误时，甚至会发出此信号。因此，建议检查error（）信号以评估服务发现发现是否成功。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the QByteArray overload of append(), this function is not limited by QByteArray's size limits. However, note that neither QCborStreamReader::readByteArray() nor QCborValue support reading CBOR streams with byte arrays larger than 2 GB.
trans-unit.target: 与append（）的QByteArray重载不同，此函数不受QByteArray的大小限制的限制。但是，请注意，QCborStreamReader :: readByteArray（）和QCborValue均不支持读取字节数组大于2 GB的CBOR流。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the fromRgb() function, the alpha-channel specified by the given QRgb value is included.
trans-unit.target: 与fromRgb（）函数不同，它包含了由给定QRgb值指定的alpha通道。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the QLatin1String overload of append(), this function is not limited to 2 GB. However, note that neither QCborStreamReader nor QCborValue support reading CBOR streams with text strings larger than 2 GB.
trans-unit.target: 与append（）的QLatin1String重载不同，此函数不限于2 GB。但是，请注意，QCborStreamReader和QCborValue都不支持读取文本字符串大于2 GB的CBOR流。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the QLatin1String overload of append(), this function is not limited to 2 GB. However, note that neither QCborStreamReader::readString() nor QCborValue support reading CBOR streams with text strings larger than 2 GB.
trans-unit.target: 与append（）的QLatin1String重载不同，此函数不限于2 GB。但是，请注意，QCborStreamReader :: readString（）和QCborValue都不支持读取文本字符串大于2 GB的CBOR流。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the QLatin1String overload of append(), this function is not limited to 2 GB. However, note that neither QCborStreamReader nor QCborValue support reading CBOR streams with text strings larger than 2 GB.
Unlike the uiLanguages() the returned value of the bcp47Name() represents the locale name of the QLocale data but not the language the user-interface should be in.
trans-unit.target: 与uiLanguages（）不同，返回的bcp47Name（）值表示QLocale数据的语言环境名称，而不是用户界面应使用的语言。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the color property, the currentColor property is updated while the user is selecting colors in the dialog, even before the final selection has been made.
trans-unit.target: 与color属性不同，即使在进行最终选择之前，用户在对话框中选择颜色时， currentColor 属性也会更新。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the currentColor property, the color property is not updated while the user is selecting colors in the dialog, but only after the final selection has been made. That is, when the user has clicked OK to accept a color. Alternatively, the accepted() signal can be handled to get the final selection.
trans-unit.target: 与currentColor属性不同，在用户在对话框中选择颜色时，不会更新 color 属性，而只会在最终选择之后更新。也就是说，当用户单击“ 确定”以接受颜色时。或者，可以处理accepted（）信号以获得最终选择。

That is, when the user has clicked OK to accept a file. Alternatively, the accepted() signal can be handled to get the final selection.
trans-unit.target: 与currentFile属性不同，用户在对话框中选择文件时，不会更新 file 属性，而只会在最终选择之后更新。也就是说，当用户单击“ 确定”以接受文件时。或者，可以处理accepted（）信号以获得最终选择。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the currentFiles property, the files property is not updated while the user is selecting files in the dialog, but only after the final selection has been made. That is, when the user has clicked OK to accept files. Alternatively, the accepted() signal can be handled to get the final selection.
trans-unit.target: 与currentFiles属性不同，在用户在对话框中选择文件时，不会更新 files 属性，而只会在最终选择之后更新。也就是说，当用户单击“ 确定”以接受文件时。或者，可以处理accepted（）信号以获得最终选择。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the file property, the currentFile property is updated while the user is selecting files in the dialog, even before the final selection has been made.
trans-unit.target: 与file属性不同，即使在最终选择之前，用户在对话框中选择文件时， currentFile 属性也会更新。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the files property, the currentFiles property is updated while the user is selecting files in the dialog, even before the final selection has been made.
trans-unit.target: 与files属性不同，用户在对话框中选择文件时，即使在做出最终选择之前， currentFiles 属性也会更新。

That is, when the user has clicked OK to accept a folder. Alternatively, the accepted() signal can be handled to get the final selection.

trans-unit.source: Unlike the width and height properties, which scale the painting of the image, this property sets the actual number of pixels stored for the loaded image so that large images do not use more memory than necessary. For example, this ensures the image in memory is no larger than 1024x1024 pixels, regardless of the Image's width and height values:
trans-unit.target: 与width和height属性不同，该属性缩放图像的绘制，此属性设置为加载的图像存储的实际像素数，这样，大图像就不会使用比必要更多的内存。例如，这可以确保内存中的图像不大于1024x1024像素，而不管图像的宽度和高度值如何：

trans-unit.source: Unlike the width and height properties, which scale the painting of the image, this property sets the maximum number of pixels stored for the loaded image so that large images do not use more memory than necessary. For example, this ensures the image in memory is no larger than 1024x1024 pixels, regardless of the Image's width and height values:

Unlike the C++ item views such as QListView or QTableView, the setData() method must be explicitly invoked from QML delegates whenever appropriate. This is done by simply assigning a new value to the corresponding model property.
trans-unit.target: 不同于C ++项目视图诸如而QListView或QTableView中，在 setData() 方法，必须明确地由QML代表调用任何适当的时候。只需将新值分配给相应的模型属性即可完成。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the Model-View-Controller pattern, the model/view design does not include a completely separate component for managing interaction with the user. Generally, the view is responsible for the presentation of model data to the user, and for processing user input. To allow some flexibility in the way this input is obtained, the interaction is performed by delegates. These components provide input capabilities and are also responsible for rendering individual items in some views. The standard interface for controlling delegates is defined in the QAbstractItemDelegate class.
trans-unit.target: 与“模型-视图-控制器”模式不同，模型/视图设计不包括用于管理与用户交互的完全独立的组件。通常，视图负责向用户呈现模型数据，并负责处理用户输入。为了使获取此输入的方式具有一定的灵活性，交互由委托执行。这些组件提供输入功能，还负责在某些视图中渲染单个项目。在QAbstractItemDelegate类中定义了用于控制委托的标准接口。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the default OpenGL Renderer, there is no built-in support to acquire an OpenVG context. This means that the renderer is responsible for requesting and managing the the current context. To do this, you use EGL directly in the OpenVG renderer. Consequently, the OpenVG renderer can only be used with platform plugins that support creating QWindows with support for QSurfaceFormat::OpenVG. From this window, the renderer can get an EGLSurface which can then be used with an EGLContext to render OpenVG content.
trans-unit.target: 与默认的OpenGL Renderer不同，它没有内置支持来获取OpenVG上下文。这意味着渲染器负责请求和管理当前上下文。为此，您可以在OpenVG渲染器中直接使用EGL 。因此，OpenVG渲染器只能与支持创建QWindows且支持QSurfaceFormat :: OpenVG的平台插件一起使用。从此窗口，渲染器可以获得EGLSurface，然后可以将其与EGLContext一起使用以渲染OpenVG内容。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the default delegate, QSqlRelationalDelegate provides a combobox for fields that are foreign keys into other tables. To use the class, simply call QAbstractItemView::setItemDelegate() on the view with an instance of QSqlRelationalDelegate:
trans-unit.target: 与默认委托不同，QSqlRelationalDelegate为作为其他表外键的字段提供了一个组合框。要使用该类，只需使用QSqlRelationalDelegate的实例在视图上调用QAbstractItemView :: setItemDelegate（）即可：

trans-unit.source: Unlike the default delegate, QSqlRelationalDelegate provides a combobox for fields that are foreign keys into other tables. To use the class, simply call QAbstractItemView::setItemDelegate() on the view with an instance of QSqlRelationalDelegate:

Unlike the earlier OpenGL-only world of Qt 5, rendering with other graphics APIs requires more well-defined points of starting and ending a frame. When manually driving the rendering loop via QQuickRenderControl, it now falls to the user of QQuickRenderControl to specify these points.
Unlike the other overload, this function can be used to perform perspective transformations on images.
trans-unit.target: 与其他重载不同的是,这个函数可以用来对图像进行透视变换。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the other overload, this function creates transformation matrices that can be used to perform perspective transformations on images.
trans-unit.target: 与其他重载不同的是,这个函数可以创建变换矩阵,用于对图像进行透视变换。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the other similar signals, this one is emitted on the GUI thread instead of the render thread. It can be used to synchronize external animation systems with the QML content. At the same time this means that this signal is not suitable for triggering graphics operations.
Unlike the other similar signals, this one is emitted on the gui thread instead of the render thread. It can be used to synchronize external animation systems with the QML content.
trans-unit.target: 与其他类似的信号不同,这个信号是在gui线程而不是渲染线程上发出的。它可以用来同步外部动画系统和QML内容。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the other similar signals, this one is emitted on the gui thread instead of the render thread. It can be used to synchronize external animation systems with the QML content. At the same time this means that this signal is not suitable for triggering graphics operations.

Unlike the similar QImage constructor that takes a non-const data buffer, this version will never alter the contents of the buffer. For example, calling QImage::bits() will return a deep copy of the image, rather than the buffer passed to the constructor. This allows for the efficiency of constructing a QImage from raw data, without the possibility of the raw data being changed.
trans-unit.target: 与采用非常量数据缓冲区的类似QImage构造函数不同，此版本永远不会更改缓冲区的内容。例如，调用QImage :: bits（）将返回图像的深层副本，而不是传递给构造函数的缓冲区。这允许从原始数据构造QImage的效率，而不必更改原始数据。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the similar QImage constructor that takes a non-const data buffer, this version will never alter the contents of the buffer. For example, calling QImage::bits() will return a deep copy of the image, rather than the buffer passed to the constructor. This allows for the efficiency of constructing a QImage from raw data, without the possibility of the raw data being changed.

Unlike the slider, QDial attempts to draw a "nice" number of notches rather than one per line step. If possible, the number of notches drawn is one per line step, but if there aren't enough pixels to draw every one, QDial will skip notches to try and draw a uniform set (e.g. by drawing every second or third notch).
trans-unit.target: 与滑块不同，QDial尝试绘制“不错”的槽口，而不是每行步长一个。如果可能的话，每行步长绘制的凹口数量为一个，但是如果没有足够的像素可绘制每个凹口，则QDial将跳过这些凹口以尝试绘制统一的集合（例如，每隔第二或第三个凹口绘制一次）。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the slider, QDial attempts to draw a "nice" number of notches rather than one per line step. If possible, the number of notches drawn is one per line step, but if there aren't enough pixels to draw every one, QDial will skip notches to try and draw a uniform set (e.g. by drawing every second or third notch).

Unlike the window managers for top-level windows, all window flags (Qt::WindowFlags) are supported by QMdiArea as long as the flags are supported by the current widget style. If a specific flag is not supported by the style (e.g., the WindowShadeButtonHint), you can still shade the window with showShaded().
trans-unit.target: 不同的是窗口管理器的顶级窗口，所有窗口标志（Qt的:: WindowFlags）是由支持QMdiArea只要标志由当前控件样式的支持。如果样式不支持特定标志（例如WindowShadeButtonHint），则仍可以使用showShaded（）来为窗口着色。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the window managers for top-level windows, all window flags (Qt::WindowFlags) are supported by QMdiArea as long as the flags are supported by the current widget style. If a specific flag is not supported by the style (e.g., the WindowShadeButtonHint), you can still shade the window with showShaded().

Unlike views like PathView and ListView, however, there is always a current item (when the model isn't empty). This means that when count is equal to 0, currentIndex will be -1. In all other cases, it will be greater than or equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: 但是，与PathView和ListView之类的视图不同，始终有一个当前项（当模型不为空时）。这意味着当count等于 0 时，currentIndex将为 -1 。在所有其他情况下，它将大于或等于 0 。

trans-unit.source: Unlike when using normal class instances (with independent properties and signal emissions), QtRO automatically synchronizes changes to the shared object across all of its copies. With a few exceptions, these copies have the identical Qt API as the original object, and are meant to be used exactly as if the original object were available.
Unlike widgets, QWindows receive touch events always, there is no need to opt in. When working directly with a QWindow, it is enough to reimplement QWindow::touchEvent().
trans-unit.target: 与窗口小部件不同，QWindows总是接收触摸事件，无需选择加入。直接使用QWindow时，重新实现QWindow :: touchEvent（）就足够了。

trans-unit.source: Unshaded Custom Materials
Unshaded custom materials

Unshaded materials are useful when interacting with scene lighting is not necessary or desired, and the material needs full control on the final fragment color. Notice how the example above has neither a DirectionalLight nor any other lights, but the sphere with the custom material shows up as expected.

Unshaded materials are useful when the object's appearance is determined completely by the custom shader code. The shaders for such materials receive minimal additions by the engine, and therefore it is completely up to the shader to determine the final fragment color. This gives more freedom, but also limits possiblities to integrate with other elements of the scene, such as lights.

trans-unit.source: Upon reception, the senderAddress() and senderPort() properties contain the address and port of the peer that sent the datagram, while destinationAddress() and destinationPort() contain the target that was contained in the datagram. That is usually an address local to the current machine, but it can also be an IPv4 broadcast address (such as "255.255.255.255") or an IPv4 or IPv6 multicast address. Applications may find it useful to determine if the datagram was sent specifically to this machine via unicast addressing or whether it was sent to multiple destinations.
trans-unit.target: 接收时，senderAddress（）和senderPort（）属性包含发送数据报的对等方的地址和端口，而destinationAddress（）和destinationPort（）包含数据报中包含的目标。这通常是当前计算机本地的地址，但也可以是IPv4广播地址（例如“ 255.255.255.255”）或IPv4或IPv6多播地址。应用程序可能会发现确定数据报是通过单播寻址专门发送到此计算机还是是否已发送到多个目的地很有用。

trans-unit.source: Upon start-up of your application, connect all signals in QInAppStore to related slots in your own QObject. Then use the registerProduct() function to register the ID of each product you expect to find registered in the external store, as well as its type.

trans-unit.source: Url string of a custom tile server. This parameter should be set to a valid server url offering the correct osm API. To use this server, the Map::activeMapType parameter of the Map should be set to the supported map type whose type is MapType.CustomMap. This map type is only be available if this plugin parameter is set, in which case it is always Map::supportedMapTypes[supportedMapTypes.length - 1].

trans-unit.source: Usage is to declare SIGNAL followed by the desired signature wrapped in parentheses. The void return value should be skipped.

Use rowCount() on the parent to find out the number of children.

trans-unit.source: Use QAxBase::dynamicCall() and QAxBase::querySubObject() as well as the QObject::setProperty() and QObject::property() APIs to call the methods and properties of the COM object through their name. Use the dumpdoc tool to get the documentation of the Qt API for any COM object and its subobjects; note that not all of the COM object's APIs might be available.

Use QAxBase::dynamicCall() and QAxBase::querySubObject() as well as the QObject::setProperty() and QObject::property() APIs to call the methods and properties of the COM object through their name. Use the dumpdoc tool to get the documentation of the Qt API for any COM object and its subobjects; note that not all of the COM object's APIs might be available.
trans-unit.target: 使用QAxBase :: dynamicCall（）和QAxBase :: querySubObject（）以及QObject :: setProperty（）和QObject :: property（）API通过名称来调用COM对象的方法和属性。使用dumpdoc工具获取任何COM对象及其子对象的Qt API文档；请注意，并非所有COM对象的API都可用。

trans-unit.source: Use insertWidget(), insertSpacing(), insertStretch() or insertLayout() to insert a box at a specified position in the layout.
trans-unit.target: 使用insertWidget（），insertSpacing（），insertStretch（）或insertLayout（）在方框中的指定位置插入一个框。

trans-unit.source: Use toTimeSpec() to express a datetime in local time or UTC, toOffsetFromUtc() to express in terms of an offset from UTC, or toTimeZone() to express it with respect to a general time zone. You can use timeSpec() to find out what time-spec a QDateTime object stores its time relative to. When that is Qt::TimeZone, you can use timeZone() to find out which zone it is using.
trans-unit.target: 使用toTimeSpec（）以当地时间或UTC表示日期时间，使用toOffsetFromUtc（）表示相对于UTC的偏移量，或使用toTimeZone（）表示相对于一般时区的日期时间。您可以使用TIMESPEC（）来找出时间规范中的一个QDateTime对象存储的时间相对。当它是Qt :: TimeZone时，您可以使用timeZone（）找出它正在使用哪个区域。

trans-unit.source: Use toTimeSpec() to express a datetime in local time or UTC, toOffsetFromUtc() to express in terms of an offset from UTC, or toTimeZone() to express it with respect to a general time zone. You can use timeSpec() to find out what time-spec a QDateTime object stores its time relative to. When that is Qt::TimeZone, you can use timeZone() to find out which zone it is using.
Use hasAttributeNS() to explicitly test for attributes with specific namespaces and names.
trans-unit.target: 使用hasAttributeNS（）显式测试具有特定名称空间和名称的属性。

trans-unit.source: Use setCurrentFont() to set the initial font attributes.
trans-unit.target: 使用setCurrentFont（）设置初始字体属性。

trans-unit.source: Use QFontMetrics(const QFont &, QPaintDevice *) to get the font metrics that are compatible with a certain paint device.
trans-unit.target: 使用QFontMetrics（常量QFont＆，QPaintDevice *）来获取与特定绘画设备兼容的字体度量。

trans-unit.source: Use QFontMetricsF(const QFont &, QPaintDevice *) to get the font metrics that are compatible with a certain paint device.
trans-unit.target: 使用QFontMetricsF（常量QFont＆，QPaintDevice *）来获取与特定绘画设备兼容的字体度量。

trans-unit.source: Use type() to determine whether a coordinate is a 2D coordinate (has latitude and longitude only) or 3D coordinate (has latitude, longitude and altitude). Use distanceTo() and azimuthTo() to calculate the distance and bearing between coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 使用类型（）来确定坐标是2D坐标（仅具有纬度和经度）还是3D坐标（具有纬度，经度和高度）。使用distanceTo（）和azimuthTo（）计算坐标之间的距离和方位。

trans-unit.source: Use merge() to merge one item selection into another without making overlapping ranges. Use split() to split one selection range into smaller ranges based on a another selection range.
trans-unit.target: 使用merge（）将一个项目选择合并到另一个项目中，而不会产生重叠范围。使用split（）可以根据另一个选择范围将一个选择范围分成较小的范围。

trans-unit.source: Use evaluate() to evaluate script code.
trans-unit.target: 使用评估（）评估脚本代码。

trans-unit.source: Use newObject() to create a JavaScript object; this is the C++ equivalent of the script statement new Object(). You can use the object-specific functionality in QJSValue to manipulate the script object (e.g. QJSValue::setProperty()). Similarly, use newArray() to create a JavaScript array object.
trans-unit.target: 使用newObject（）创建一个JavaScript对象；这与脚本语句 new Object() 的C ++等效。您可以在QJSValue中使用特定于对象的功能来操作脚本对象（例如QJSValue :: setProperty（））。同样，使用newArray（）创建一个JavaScript数组对象。

trans-unit.source: Use newQMetaObject() to wrap a QMetaObject; this gives you a "script representation" of a QObject-based class. newQMetaObject() returns a proxy script object; enum values of the class are available as properties of the proxy object.
trans-unit.target: 使用newQMetaObject（）包装QMetaObject ; 这为您提供了基于QObject的类的“脚本表示形式” 。newQMetaObject（）返回代理脚本对象；该类的枚举值可用作代理对象的属性。

trans-unit.source: Use newQObject() to wrap a QObject (or subclass) pointer. newQObject() returns a proxy script object; properties, children, and signals and slots of the QObject are available as properties of the proxy object. No binding code is needed because it is done dynamically using the Qt meta object system.
trans-unit.target: 使用newQObject（）包装QObject（或子类）指针。newQObject（）返回代理脚本对象；属性，子对象以及QObject的信号和插槽可用作代理对象的属性。不需要绑定代码，因为它是使用Qt元对象系统动态完成的。

trans-unit.source: Use equals() or strictlyEquals() to compare a QJSValue to another.
trans-unit.target: 使用的equals（）或strictlyEquals（）的比较QJSValue到另一个。

trans-unit.source: Use equals() or strictlyEquals() to compare a QJSValue to another.
Use QLocale's methods for converting dates and times to and from strings, with the long format of the locale used by the operating system.
Use QLocale's methods for converting dates and times to and from strings, with the long formatthe application's locale.
Use QLocale's methods for converting dates and times to and from strings, with the short format of the application's locale.
Use QLocale's methods for converting dates and times to and from strings, with the short format of the locale used by the operating system.
Use language() and country() to determine the actual language and country values used.
trans-unit.target: 使用语言（）和国家（）确定实际使用的语言和国家/地区值。

trans-unit.source: Use QMainWindow::restoreState() to restore the geometry and the state of toolbars and dock widgets.
trans-unit.target: 使用QMainWindow :: restoreState（）恢复工具栏和停靠小部件的几何形状和状态。

trans-unit.source: Use QMainWindow::saveState() to save the geometry and the state of toolbars and dock widgets.
trans-unit.target: 使用QMainWindow :: saveState（）保存几何图形以及工具栏和停靠小部件的状态。

trans-unit.source: Use name() for the enumerator's name. The enumerator's keys (names of each enumerated item) are returned by key(); use keyCount() to find the number of keys. isFlag() returns whether the enumerator is meant to be used as a flag, meaning that its values can be combined using the OR operator.
trans-unit.target: 使用name（）作为枚举器的名称。枚举器的键（每个枚举项的名称）由键（）返回；使用keyCount（）查找键数。isFlag（）返回是否将枚举数用作标志，这意味着可以使用OR运算符组合其值。

trans-unit.source: Use SkeletonLoader if you wish to load a whole skeleton from file rather than creating the joints yourself using Skeleton and Joints. Creating a skeleton and binding the vertices of a mesh to the skeleton is most easily performed in a 3D digital content creation tool such as Blender. The resulting skeleton and mesh can then be exported in a suitable format such as glTF 2 for consumption by Qt 3D.
trans-unit.target: 使用SkeletonLoader如果你希望从文件加载一个整体框架，而不是使用骨骼和关节自己创造的关节。在3D数字内容创建工具（例如Blender）中，最容易执行创建骨架并将网格的顶点绑定到骨架的操作。然后，可以以合适的格式（例如glTF 2）导出生成的骨架和网格，以供Qt 3D使用。

trans-unit.source: Use startUpdates() to start receiving regular position updates and stopUpdates() to stop these updates. If you only require updates occasionally, you can call requestUpdate() to request a single update.
trans-unit.target: 使用startUpdates（）开始接收常规位置更新，并使用stopUpdates（）停止这些更新。如果仅偶尔需要更新，则可以调用requestUpdate（）来请求单个更新。

trans-unit.source: Use QPixmapCache::insert() to receive an instance of Key generated by the pixmap cache. You can store the key in your own objects for a very efficient one-to-one object-to-pixmap mapping.
trans-unit.target: 使用QPixmapCache :: insert（）接收由像素映射缓存生成的Key实例。您可以将密钥存储在自己的对象中，以实现非常高效的一对一对象到像素映射。

trans-unit.source: Use QPluginLoader in the application to load the plugins.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序中使用QPluginLoader加载插件。

trans-unit.source: Use setMinimum() and setMaximum() or the constructor to set the number of "steps" in the operation and call setValue() as the operation progresses. The number of steps can be chosen arbitrarily. It can be the number of files copied, the number of bytes received, the number of iterations through the main loop of your algorithm, or some other suitable unit. Progress starts at the value set by setMinimum(), and the progress dialog shows that the operation has finished when you call setValue() with the value set by setMaximum() as its argument.
trans-unit.target: 使用setMinimum（）和setMaximum（）或构造函数来设置操作中的“步数”，并在操作进行时调用setValue（）。步数可以任意选择。它可以是复制的文件数，接收的字节数，通过算法主循环的迭代数或其他合适的单位。进度从setMinimum（）设置的值开始，并且进度对话框显示以setMaximum（）设置的值作为参数调用setValue（）时操作已完成。

trans-unit.source: Use beginWriteArray() to write the array in the first place.

trans-unit.source: Use QSkeleton if you wish to manually create the joints of a skeleton for use with skinned meshes. This is mainly of use to people creating editors, tooling, or dynamic skeletons. It is more common that a Qt 3D application would simply consume an existing skeleton and skinned mesh as created in a digital content creation tool such as Blender. For this use case, please see QSkeletonLoader.
trans-unit.target: 如果希望手动创建用于蒙皮网格物体的骨架关节，请使用QSkeleton。这主要用于创建编辑器，工具或动态框架的人员。更常见的是，Qt 3D应用程序会简单地消耗现有的骨架和蒙皮网格，如在Blender等数字内容创建工具中创建的那样。对于此用例，请参见QSkeletonLoader。

trans-unit.source: Use QSKIP() to handle cases where a whole test function is found at run-time to be inapplicable in the current test environment. When just a part of a test function is to be skipped, a conditional statement can be used, optionally with a qDebug() call to report the reason for skipping the inapplicable part.
Use setHtml() or setPlainText() directly to avoid text edit's guessing.
trans-unit.target: 直接使用setHtml（）或setPlainText（）可以避免文本编辑的猜测。

trans-unit.source: Use say() to start synthesizing text. It is possible to specify the language with setLocale(). To select between the available voices use setVoice(). The languages and voices depend on the available synthesizers on each platform. On Linux, speech-dispatcher is used by default.
trans-unit.target: 使用say（）开始合成文本。可以使用setLocale（）指定语言。要在可用声音之间进行选择，请使用setVoice（）。语言和声音取决于每个平台上可用的合成器。在Linux上，默认情况下使用 speech-dispatcher 。

trans-unit.source: Use wait() to block the calling thread, until the other thread has finished execution (or until a specified time has passed).
trans-unit.target: 使用wait（）阻止调用线程，直到另一个线程完成执行（或直到经过指定的时间）为止。

trans-unit.source: Use C++ for dynamic data sets that are large or frequently modified.
trans-unit.target: 将C ++用于大型或经常修改的动态数据集。

trans-unit.target: 使用crossProduct（）计算

Use QWidget::windowHandle() to get a QWindow pointer from a QWidget instance. At app startup the QWindow might not have been created yet, call QWidget::winId() to make sure it is.

trans-unit.source: Use index() to locate the position of an attribute in the list, count() to retrieve the number of attributes, and clear() to remove the attributes. The attribute's name is available from localName() or qName(), and its namespace URI from uri().
trans-unit.target: 使用index（）在列表中找到属性的位置，使用count（）检索属性的数量，并使用clear（）删除属性。可以使用append（）添加新属性。使用type（）获取属性的类型，使用value（）获取其值。该属性的名称可从localName（）或qName（）获得，其名称空间URI可从uri（）获得。

trans-unit.target: 使用 console.log ， console.debug ， console.info ， console.warn 或 console.error 将调试信息打印到控制台。

For this use case, please see QSkeletonLoader.

trans-unit.source: Use Qt Concurrent's QtConcurrent::filter() function to select container elements, and the QtConcurrent::map() function to apply an operation to each element. To fold the output into a single result, use QtConcurrent::filteredReduced() and QtConcurrent::mappedReduced() instead.

trans-unit.source: Use SVG images for small icons. While larger SVGs can be slow to render, small ones work well. Vector images avoid the need to provide several versions of an image, as is necessary with bitmap images.
trans-unit.target: 使用SVG图像来制作小图标。虽然较大的SVG渲染速度可能很慢,但小的SVG效果很好。矢量图像避免了像使用位图图像那样,需要提供一个图像的多个版本。

trans-unit.source: Use Skeleton if you wish to manually create the joints of a skeleton for use with skinned meshes. This is mainly of use to people creating editors, tooling, or dynamic skeletons. It is more common that a Qt 3D application would simply consume an existing skeleton and skinned mesh as created in a digital content creation tool such as Blender. For this use case, please see SkeletonLoader.
trans-unit.target: 如果希望手动创建用于蒙皮网格物体的骨架的关节，请使用“骨架”。这主要用于创建编辑器，工具或动态框架的人员。更常见的是，Qt 3D应用程序会简单地消耗现有的骨架和蒙皮网格，如在Blender等数字内容创建工具中创建的那样。对于此用例，请参见SkeletonLoader。

trans-unit.source: Use SkeletonLoader if you wish to load a whole skeleton from file rather than creating the joints yourself using Skeleton and Joints. Creating a skeleton and binding the vertices of a mesh to the skeleton is most easily performed in a 3D digital content creation tool such as Blender. The resulting skeleton and mesh can then be exported in a suitable format such as glTF 2 for consumption by Qt 3D.
Use WorkerScript to run operations in a new thread. This is useful for running operations in the background so that the main GUI thread is not blocked.
Use YesToAll instead.

trans-unit.source: Use a lossless image rendering, whenever possible. Currently, this hint is only used when QPainter is employed to output a PDF file through QPrinter or QPdfWriter, where drawImage()/drawPixmap() calls will encode images using a lossless compression algorithm instead of lossy JPEG compression. This value was added in Qt 5.13.

Use a lossless image rendering, whenever possible. Currently, this hint is only used when QPainter is employed to output a PDF file through QPrinter or QPdfWriter, where drawImage()/drawPixmap() calls will encode images using a lossless compression algorithm instead of lossy JPEG compression. This value was added in Qt 5.13.
trans-unit.target: 尽可能使用无损图像渲染。当前，仅当使用QPainter通过QPrinter或QPdfWriter输出PDF文件时使用此提示，其中drawImage（）/ drawPixmap（）调用将使用无损压缩算法而不是有损JPEG压缩对图像进行编码。这个值是在Qt 5.13中添加的。

trans-unit.source: Use opaque primitives where possible. Opaque primitives are faster to process in the renderer and faster to draw on the GPU. For instance, PNG files will often have an alpha channel, even though each pixel is fully opaque. JPG files are always opaque. When providing images to a QQuickImageProvider or creating images with QQuickWindow::createTextureFromImage(), let the image have QImage::Format_RGB32, when possible.
trans-unit.target: 尽可能使用不透明的图元。不透明基元在渲染器中处理速度更快，在GPU上绘制速度更快。例如，即使每个像素都是完全不透明的，PNG文件通常也将具有alpha通道。JPG文件始终是不透明的。当将图像提供给QQuickImageProvider或使用QQuickWindow :: createTextureFromImage（）创建图像时，请尽可能使图像具有QImage :: Format_RGB32。

trans-unit.source: Use paragraphs as boundary.

trans-unit.source: Used by other components to obtain information about each item provided by the model. In many models, the combination of flags should include Qt::ItemIsEnabled and Qt::ItemIsSelectable.
trans-unit.target: 由其他组件用于获取有关模型提供的每个项目的信息。在许多模型中，标志的组合应包括Qt :: ItemIsEnabled和Qt :: ItemIsSelectable。

trans-unit.source: Used by the showMessage() and clearMessage() functions.
trans-unit.target: 由showMessage（）和clearMessage（）函数使用。

trans-unit.source: Used by the system to set the
trans-unit.target: 被系统用来设置

trans-unit.source: Used by visual elements to decide if the item should use antialiasing or not. In some cases items with antialiasing require more memory and are potentially slower to render (see Antialiasing for more details).
trans-unit.target: 视觉元素用于确定项目是否应使用抗锯齿。在某些情况下，具有抗锯齿功能的项目需要更多内存，并且渲染速度可能会更慢（有关更多详细信息，请参见抗锯齿功能）。

trans-unit.source: Used currently for the WebXML output format.
trans-unit.target: 当前用于 WebXML 输出格式。

trans-unit.source: Used for adjusting task parameters
Used for all rendered content in the scene graph
trans-unit.target: 用于场景图中所有渲染的内容。

trans-unit.source: Used for pop-up widgets. Indicates that the most recent mouse press event should not be replayed when the pop-up widget closes. The flag is set by the widget's author and cleared by the Qt kernel every time the widget receives a new mouse event.
trans-unit.target: 用于弹出式小组件。表示当弹出式小组件关闭时,最近的鼠标按下事件不应重放。该标志由小组件的作者设置,并在小组件每次收到新的鼠标事件时由Qt内核清除。

trans-unit.source: Used if selectionMode has the QAbstract3DGraph::SelectionItem flag set.
trans-unit.target: 如果selectionMode设置了 QAbstract3DGraph::SelectionItem 标志，则使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Used if selectionMode has the QAbstract3DGraph::SelectionRow or QAbstract3DGraph::SelectionColumn flag set.
trans-unit.target: 如果selectionMode设置了 QAbstract3DGraph::SelectionRow 或 QAbstract3DGraph::SelectionColumn 标志，则使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Used in QSGNode::markDirty() to indicate how the scene graph has changed.
trans-unit.target: 在QSGNode :: markDirty（）中使用，以指示场景图如何更改。

trans-unit.source: Used in combination with QBrush to specify a conical gradient brush
trans-unit.target: 与QBrush结合使用,指定一个锥形渐变笔刷。

trans-unit.source: Used in combination with QBrush to specify a linear gradient brush
trans-unit.target: 与QBrush结合使用,指定线性渐变笔刷。

trans-unit.source: Used in combination with QBrush to specify a radial gradient brush
trans-unit.target: 与QBrush结合使用,指定一个径向渐变笔刷。

trans-unit.source: Used in combination with QBrush to specify gradient fills
trans-unit.target: 与QBrush结合使用来指定渐变填充。

trans-unit.source: Used in conjunction with QQuickItem::itemChange() to notify the item about certain types of changes.
trans-unit.target: 与QQuickItem :: itemChange（）结合使用，以通知项目有关某些类型的更改。

trans-unit.source: Used mostly as the background color for text editor controls and item views. It is usually white or another light color.
Used mostly as the background color for text editor controls and items views. It is usually white or another light color.
trans-unit.target: 主要用作文本编辑器控件和项目视图的背景色。它通常是白色或其他浅色。

trans-unit.source: Used mostly as the background color for text entry widgets, but can also be used for other painting - such as the background of combobox drop down lists and toolbar handles. It is usually white or another light color.
trans-unit.target: 主要用作文本输入部件的背景色,但也可用于其他绘画--如组合框下拉列表和工具栏手柄的背景。它通常是白色或其他浅色。

trans-unit.source: Used to add new columns and items of data to table models and hierarchical models. Implementations must call beginInsertColumns()
trans-unit.target: 用于向表模型和层次模型添加新的列和数据项。实现必须调用beginInsertColumns（）

trans-unit.source: Used to add new rows and items of data to all types of model. Implementations must call beginInsertRows()
trans-unit.target: 用于向所有类型的模型添加新行和数据项。实现必须调用beginInsertRows（）

trans-unit.source: Used to associate custom data with blocks of text
trans-unit.target: 用于将自定义数据与文本块关联起来

trans-unit.source: Used to calculate skinning transform matrices and set them on shaders
trans-unit.target: 用于计算换肤矩阵并将其设置在着色器上。

trans-unit.target: 用于计算蒙皮变换矩阵并将其设置在着色器上。更多...

trans-unit.target: 用于计算蒙皮变换矩阵并将其设置在着色器上。更多...

trans-unit.source: Used to change opacity of nodes
trans-unit.target: 用于改变节点的不透明度

trans-unit.source: Used to create keyboard shortcuts
trans-unit.target: 用于创建键盘快捷键

trans-unit.source: Used to decide if the Rectangle should use antialiasing or not. Antialiasing provides information on the performance implications of this property.
trans-unit.target: 用于确定Rectangle是否应使用抗锯齿。抗锯齿提供有关此属性对性能的影响的信息。

trans-unit.source: Used to decide if the Text should use antialiasing or not. Only Text with renderType of Text.NativeRendering can disable antialiasing.
trans-unit.target: 用于决定文本是否应使用抗锯齿。只有具有renderType为Text.NativeRendering的Text 才能禁用抗锯齿。

trans-unit.source: Used to define columns in a TableView or in a TreeView. More...
trans-unit.target: 用于在TableView或TreeView中定义列。更多...

trans-unit.source: Used to define columns in a TableView or in a TreeView
trans-unit.target: 用于定义TableView或TreeView中的列。

trans-unit.source: Used to describe the parameters needed to draw a QGraphicsItem
trans-unit.target: 用于描述绘制QGraphicsItem所需的参数。

trans-unit.source: Used to display and edit data items from a model
trans-unit.target: 用于显示和编辑模型中的数据项。

trans-unit.source: Used to draw the contents of SVG files onto paint devices
trans-unit.target: 用于将SVG文件的内容绘制到绘画设备上。

trans-unit.source: Used to find places from one manager that match those from another. It represents a set of request parameters
trans-unit.target: 用于从一个管理器中找到与另一个管理器相匹配的位置。它代表一组请求参数

trans-unit.source: Used to generate fillable outlines for a given painter path
trans-unit.target: 用于为给定的画家路径生成可填充的轮廓。

trans-unit.source: Used to implement namespace support for a reader. Note that namespaces do not change the parsing behavior. They are only reported through the handler.
trans-unit.target: 用于实现对阅读器的命名空间支持。请注意,命名空间不会改变解析行为。它们只通过处理程序报告。

trans-unit.source: Used to import and use the module's QML types. More...
trans-unit.target: 用于导入和使用模块的QML类型。更多...

trans-unit.source: Used to indicate a mini style Mac widget or button.
trans-unit.target: 用来表示一个迷你风格的Mac小部件或按钮。

trans-unit.source: Used to indicate a preset has not been set, or the scene has been rotated freely.
trans-unit.target: 用于表示预设未被设置,或场景已被自由旋转。

trans-unit.source: Used to indicate a small style Mac widget or button.
trans-unit.target: 用来表示一个小样式的Mac小部件或按钮。

trans-unit.source: Used to indicate a tri-state checkbox.
trans-unit.target: 用于表示三态复选框。

trans-unit.source: Used to indicate if a button is raised.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示按钮是否被提起。

trans-unit.source: Used to indicate if a down arrow should be visible on the widget.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示是否应在小组件上显示向下箭头。

trans-unit.source: Used to indicate if a widget is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示小组件是否为只读。

trans-unit.source: Used to indicate if a widget is selected.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示是否选择了一个小组件。

trans-unit.source: Used to indicate if an editor is opened on the widget.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示小组件上是否有编辑器被打开。

trans-unit.source: Used to indicate if an item view branch has children.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示项目视图分支是否有子项目。
